targets.rawSql:
select
  *
from
  public.ceph_build_info
inner join public.loc_data
  on public.ceph_build_info.ceph_version = public.loc_data.loc_version
where public.loc_data.loc_version like '14.%';

select
  *
from
  public.ceph_build_info
inner join public.loc_data
  on public.ceph_build_info.ceph_version = public.loc_data.loc_version
where public.loc_data.loc_version like '16.%';

select
  *
from
  public.ceph_build_info
inner join public.loc_data
  on public.ceph_build_info.ceph_version = public.loc_data.loc_version
where public.loc_data.loc_version like '14.%';

select
  *
from
  public.ceph_build_info
inner join public.loc_data
  on public.ceph_build_info.ceph_version = public.loc_data.loc_version
where public.loc_data.loc_version like '16.%';

select
  *
from
  public.ceph_build_info
inner join public.loc_data
  on public.ceph_build_info.ceph_version = public.loc_data.loc_version
where public.loc_data.loc_version like '14.%';

select
  *
from
  public.ceph_build_info
inner join public.loc_data
  on public.ceph_build_info.ceph_version = public.loc_data.loc_version
where public.loc_data.loc_version like '16.%';

select
  *
from
  public.ceph_build_info as build_info
inner join public.loc_data as loc_data
  on loc_data.loc_version = build_info.ceph_version;

panels.title: LOC, build duration over time (all versions)

targets.rawSql:
select
  *
from
  public.ceph_build_info
inner join public.loc_data
  on public.ceph_build_info.ceph_version = public.loc_data.loc_version
where public.loc_data.loc_version like '14.%';

SELECT
  brew.build.*,brew.events.time
  AS creation_time
FROM brew.build
INNER JOIN brew.events ON brew.build.create_event=brew.events.id
WHERE
  brew.build.pkg_id = 34590 AND
  brew.build.state  = 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.description: Table collection of all build time data from brew.build db.

targets.rawSql:

  brew.build.state  = 1

panels.description: Distribution of source file sizes by version.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  version,size,buildtime
FROM
  rpminfo
WHERE
  name = 'ceph' and arch = 'src' and version > '10.1.0';

panels.title: src_size (version)
